Armads.effect: Unit makes a guaranteed followup attack when attacked at HP > 80%

Assassin's Bow+.effect: Effective against fliers. If target has a dagger, it can't make a followup attack and this unit will.

Aura.effect: Restores 5 HP to adjacent allies after any combat this unit initiates.

Binding Blade.effect: Grants Def/Res+2 when this unit is attacked

Blárblade+.effect: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Adds total bonus on unit to damage dealt.

Blárraven+.effect: Grants weapon advantage vs colorless foes.

Brave Bow+.effect: Spd-5. Effective against flying units. Attacks twice if unit initiates combat.

Brave Lance+.effect: Spd-5, attacks twice when unit initiates.

Brave Sword+.effect: Spd-5. 2x Attack on the users turn.

Brynhildr.effect: If user initiates attack, foe cannot move more than 1 space next turn

Cymbeline.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

Dark Breath+.effect: After this unit attacks, foes within 2 spaces of target suffer Atk/Spd-5 through their next actions.

Deathly Dagger.effect: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on foe through its next action. If unit initiated combat, 7 damage to foe after battle.

Dire Thunder.effect: Spd-5. Attack twice when initiating combat.

Durandal.effect: Grants Atk+4 during combat if unit initiates attack.

Emerald Axe+.effect: Gives Atk+20% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-20% if disadvantage

Falchion.effect: Effective against dragons. At the start of every third turn, unit recovers 10HP

Fensalir.effect: Inflicts Atk-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Fólkvangr.effect: Grants Atk+5 at start of turn if unit's HP<50%

Fujin Yumi.effect: Effective against flying units. Unit can pass through foes if own HP>=50%

Gravity.effect: After any combat, prevents foe from moving more than 1 space through its next action.

Gronnblade+.effect: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Adds total bonus on unit to damage dealt.

Killer Bow+.effect: Effective against flying units. Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1)

Light Breath+.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def/Res+4 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

Lightning Breath+.effect: Enables counterattack regardless of attacker's range. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1)

Naga.effect: Grants Def/Res+2 when this unit is attacked.

Nóatún.effect: Unit may move adjacent to any ally when HP <= 40%

Pain.effect: Inflicts 10 damage on Foe after combat

Panic.effect: After combat, bonuses on targeted foe become penalties through its next action.

Parthia.effect: Effective against flying units. Grants Res+4 during combat if initiating an attack.

Poison Dagger+.effect: Effective against infantry units. Infantry foes suffer Def/Res-6 after combat through their next actions.

Raijinto.effect: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Rauðrblade+.effect: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Adds total bonus on unit to damage dealt.

Rauðrraven+.effect: Grants weapon advantage vs. colorless foes.

Rogue Dagger+.effect: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-5 on foe through its next action. Grants unit Def/Res+5 for 1 turn.

Ruby Sword+.effect: Gives Atk+20% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-20% if disadvantage

Sapphire Lance+.effect: Gives Atk+20% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-20% if disadvantage.

Sieglinde.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Siegmund.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Silver Dagger+.effect: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on foe through its next action.

Slow.effect: After any combat, inflicts Spd-6 on foe through its next action.

Smoke Dagger+.effect: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Sol Katti.effect: If wielder initiates attack at HP <=50% any followup occurs immediately.

Tyrfing.effect: Grants Def+4 in battle if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Wo Dao+.effect: Grants +10 to damage when Special triggers.

Yato.effect: Grants Spd+4 during combat if unit initiates attack
